title: Ralph UI renders repeated box borders during error loop
description: When Ralph hits repeated errors (like blocked story loop), the Ink UI renders many duplicate box borders without content. Output shows dozens of empty ╭───╮ borders stacked.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Reproduce: Run Ralph with story that has blockedBy mismatch (or simulate error loop)
Find Ink component that renders iteration box (likely Dashboard or StatusBox)
Add guard: Don't re-render box if content unchanged from previous render
Or: Clear previous output before rendering new iteration status
Test: Simulate 5 rapid error iterations, verify no duplicate empty boxes
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-004 prevent duplicate box renders in error loop
